name: App Performance Tool
author: Carl Alberto

sections.description:
This plugin will contain common checks for performance bottle necks liks:

Autoload, index, Pantheon plugins,post meta checks, user checks, wordpress plugins, db healthcheck, woocommerce performance, New relic data, cron data, etc
sections.installation:
Installing “App Perf” can be done either by searching for “App Perf” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
